name: Zen Arts: Relaxing Pendulum Paint Simulator
name_original: Zen Arts: Relaxing Pendulum Paint Simulator
description:
Using the concepts of mindfulness and arts therapy in aiding relaxation and releasing mental stress; and inspired by a patient of mine, who finds art helpful in managing her anxiety disorder, however struggles to get started due to lack of confidence in her skill.
Hopefully with Zen Arts, anyone, regardless of age or skills, can make great arts! The only limitation is your imagination!
There is no winning or losing in this game, simply a sandbox to hopefully make your day a bit better!
